commands.what_do_you_want_to_do: > What do you want to do? (Use the mouse to select)

our_financial_project.description: The system offers a robust and intuitive solution for financial management, covering everything from basic control to advanced features. Below are the main characteristics:
our_financial_project.movement_management: Income and Expense Management: Enables the recording and tracking of revenues and expenses, with financial expenses categorized as either simple or made via credit card, with expenses automatically organized in the current bill.
our_financial_project.goals_definition: Financial Goal Setting: Allows for the creation of financial goals with customized deadlines, ranging from specific objectives, such as buying an item, to long-term plans like retirement.
our_financial_project.movement_between_accounts: Account-to-Account Transfers: Funds can be transferred between personal accounts easily and securely.
our_financial_project.shared_management: Individual or Shared Management: The system supports both individual and multi-user management, making it ideal for couples or groups sharing financial control.
our_financial_project.multiple_currencies: Support for Multiple Currencies: Transaction registration and control available in BRL (Brazilian Real), CAD (Canadian Dollar), and USD (US Dollar).
our_financial_project.personal_integration: Integration of Personal and Investment Accounts: Provides a consolidated view of all accounts, whether personal or investment.

about_me.title: Settings
about_me.name: Name
about_me.about_text: Highly skilled with over 6 years of experience in the field. Experienced in working with small to medium-sized teams, contributing to the implementation of new solutions ensuring high scalability and maintainability of developed applications. Focused on fast and continuous delivery, achieving excellent results by training less experienced developers to deliver high-quality code.

our_financial.title: Our Financial
our_financial.description: Manage your personal and shared finances with account control, financial goals, and multiple currencies all in one place
